title: Problem making models with joints static

content.raw:
Tried making pr2 static but segfaults on start up

backtrace:

```
#!c++

Program received signal SIGSEGV, Segmentation fault.
[Switching to Thread 0x7fff859b5700 (LWP 10281)]
0x00007ffff34d7b20 in _dCalcVectorDot3 (step_a=1, b=0x1ab38f0, a=0x158, step_b=1) at /home/ian/depot/gazebo/deps/opende/include/ode/odemath.h:178
178	  return a[0] * b[0] + a[step_a] * b[step_b] + a[2 * step_a] * b[2 * step_b];
(gdb) bt
#0  0x00007ffff34d7b20 in _dCalcVectorDot3 (step_a=1, b=0x1ab38f0, a=0x158, step_b=1) at /home/ian/depot/gazebo/deps/opende/include/ode/odemath.h:178
#1  dCalcVectorDot3 (b=0x1ab38f0, a=0x158) at /home/ian/depot/gazebo/deps/opende/include/ode/odemath.h:182
#2  dMultiplyHelper0_331 (b=0x1ab38f0, a=0x158, res=<synthetic pointer>) at /home/ian/depot/gazebo/deps/opende/include/ode/odemath.h:284
#3  dMultiply0_331 (b=0x1ab38f0, a=0x158, res=<synthetic pointer>) at /home/ian/depot/gazebo/deps/opende/include/ode/odemath.h:323
#4  dJointGetSliderPositionRate (j=0x1ab3840) at /home/ian/depot/gazebo/deps/opende/src/joints/slider.cpp:95
#5  0x00007ffff73131ac in gazebo::physics::Joint::ApplyDamping (this=0x1aa3620) at /home/ian/depot/gazebo/gazebo/physics/Joint.cc:515
#6  0x00007ffff7318ad2 in operator() (this=<optimized out>) at /usr/include/boost/function/function_template.hpp:1013
#7  Signal (this=0x1aa3740) at /home/ian/depot/gazebo/gazebo/common/Event.hh:126
#8  operator() (this=0x1aa3740) at /home/ian/depot/gazebo/gazebo/common/Event.hh:119
#9  gazebo::physics::Joint::Update (this=0x1aa3620) at /home/ian/depot/gazebo/gazebo/physics/Joint.cc:297
#10 0x00007ffff733d2f6 in gazebo::physics::Model::Update (this=0x8da540) at /home/ian/depot/gazebo/gazebo/physics/Model.cc:216
#11 0x00007ffff7359012 in gazebo::physics::World::ModelUpdateSingleLoop (this=0x8787e0) at /home/ian/depot/gazebo/gazebo/physics/World.cc:1143
#12 0x00007ffff7368cf4 in gazebo::physics::World::Update (this=0x8787e0) at /home/ian/depot/gazebo/gazebo/physics/World.cc:556
#13 0x00007ffff73695f1 in gazebo::physics::World::Step (this=0x8787e0) at /home/ian/depot/gazebo/gazebo/physics/World.cc:489
#14 0x00007ffff736a518 in gazebo::physics::World::RunLoop (this=0x8787e0) at /home/ian/depot/gazebo/gazebo/physics/World.cc:353
#15 0x00007ffff5f4bce9 in thread_proxy () from /usr/lib/libboost_thread.so.1.46.1
#16 0x00007ffff6ab5e9a in start_thread () from /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libpthread.so.0
#17 0x00007ffff52f4cbd in clone () from /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libc.so.6
#18 0x0000000000000000 in ?? ()
(gdb) 
```
